name: Demolition Debby
description:
Debby's divorce to her millionaire husband Derek isn't going well at all and so she's decided to enact revenge where it hurts; his empire!

Objective —

Try and destroy Derek's estate (trees, buildings, walls...basically anything) while being pursued by the police. Collect fuel and repair kits to keep yourself mobile and alive.

Controls —

Gamepad enabled (and recommended).
To toggle between PC/Gamepad hud hints press TAB.

Keyboard
WASD - Movement 
Shift - Boost
E - Smoke
F - Smash

Mouse Scroll - Zoom
R - Restart

Gamepad
LT/RT - Forwards/Backwards
Left Thumbstick - Turn
Right Face Button Right - Boost
Right Face Button Top - Smoke
Right Face Button Bottom - Smash

Up/Down DPad - Zoom
Right Shoulder - Restart

ESC - Exit

\
